            #include <iostream>
            #include <vector>
            using namespace std;
            bool solve() {
                int n;
                cin >> n;
                vector<long long> a(n);
                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
                    cin >> a[i];
                }
                // remove leading and trailing zeros
                int l = 0, r = n - 1;
                while (l < n && a[l] == 0) l++;
                while (r >= 0 && a[r] == 0) r--;

                if (l > r) {
                    return true;
                }

                vector<long long> b;
                for (int i = l; i <= r; i++) {
                    b.push_back(a[i]);
                }
                // Check the sum of b is 0? -> the total sum of the non-zero part must be 0? 
                // But the entire array sum is 0, and we removed zeros, so the non-zero part sum=0.
                // However, we will see.

                // The condition in the editorial: 
                //   We must have that the prefix sum is >0 for all proper prefixes of b, and the sum of b is 0.
                long long s = 0;
                for (int i = 0; i < b.size(); i++) {
                    s += b[i];
                    if (s <= 0 && i < b.size()-1) {
                        return false;
                    }
                }
                return s == 0;
            }

            int main() {
                int t;
                cin >> t;
                while (t--) {
                    if (solve()) {
                        cout << "Yes\n";
                    } else {
                        cout << "No\n";
                    }
                }
            }
